group_1.textLeft: Himena Aika...
...had said that we and the Neo-Magius@were "alike,"
but I think she said that because of a misunderstanding...

group_1.textRight: Misunderstanding...?

group_1.textLeft: We, the Diviners...@Are proud to be Magical Girls,
but we are not superior, nor do we want anyone@to bow to us.
What's more, we do not look down upon others,
unlike the Neo-Magius.

group_1.textRight: Ahh, I get it...

group_1.textLeft: ...When I thought about...
...how others outside of the clan view us,
the first person that came to mind@was Iroha,
the head of the Union who doesn't see@Magical Girls as anything special...
Iroha's manner of always trying to discuss@things first is true equality...
...because she tries to be respectful and fair@to those she speaks to.

group_1.textRight: ...Have you talked to her?

group_1.textLeft: I couldn't go...
...because we had just broken our alliance.
I've been thinking on it alone, but I cannot@find an answer...

group_1.textRight: So that's why you're not feeling well...

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.
Hey...
Natsuki, from your point of view,@do we look down upon humans?

group_1.textRight: Doesn't look that way to me at all.

group_1.textLeft: ...Really?

group_1.textRight: Do you remember the first time we met?

group_1.textCenter: Kamihama just suffered from a disaster, and yet@everyone still lives here cherishing each day.
These modest daily lives are what we Diviners@should strive to protect...
As a Magical Girl, don't you agree?

group_1.textRight: I think Iroha also wants to protect...
...your daily life, Shizuka.
And there's the fact that she doesn't hurt people@for her ideals.
You two just go about it in different ways@and have different values.
Makes me wonder if you both are always thinking@about how to make everyone happy...

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, I certainly think so, and I'm sure Iroha@does, too...

group_1.textRight: ...If you think about it,
isn't it because you "love humans," Shizuka?
Huh, am I wrong...?

group_1.textLeft: ...No, it's just I have never really thought of it...
But, you're right...
...Yes, I do love humans.
But...how did you know that?@I did not even know that myself...

group_1.textRight: Umm, well...
Because you think all people are good, and@it shows in your actions, I guess?

group_1.textLeft: I see...you're right...yeah...@It's not easy to say, but...
I...do not think there are any bad people in this@world... There are only good people...
And that is what I want to protect...

group_1.textRight: I don't think someone like that would look down@on anyone.

group_1.textLeft: ...Natsuki.

group_1.textRight: Listen to me...I sound like I'm repeating@sermon time to you here.

group_1.textLeft: Sermon...?

group_1.textRight: My school's Buddhist, so we have sermon time@in the mornings.
The way we think about things, life lessons,@we listen to all sorts of things like that...

group_1.textLeft: Hehh...
...Thank you. My spirit is lifted.

group_1.textRight: Ehehe.@Well, that's great...!
Ah, right, if you live in a temple,
I think it would be a good idea to talk to@the chief priest.

group_1.textLeft: The chief priest...?

group_1.textRight: For good and evil, and how to perceive it,
I think he would be able to tell you in a way@that's more understandable.

group_1.textLeft: Right. I will do that.
Natsuki, did something also happen to you...?
